attributes.action: cheaper holidays in the school summer holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we are getting threatened by councils that if we take our kids out of school in term time in order to go on a holiday we will be fined or sent to prison. Yet the government allow holiday providers to scam us out of double the cost in the summer holiday period. We want Holiday prices not to be aimed and planned around the school holidays time table its targeted theft its targeted abuse and they get away with charging more money to people that follow the rules. 

THIS GOVERNMENT HAS TO PROTECT ITS PEOPLE!!!!
TIME TO STOP THE OVER CHARGING !!!
TIME FOR CHEAPER HOLIDAYS IN SCHOOL HOLIDAY PERIODS !!!

rejection.details: It is up to individual companies to set their own prices.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
